Package eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork

Interface ContextualEgoNetworkListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivityListener, AsyncRunListener, CreationListener, LoggingListener, RecoveryListener
    public interface ContextualEgoNetworkListener
    An interface of listeners that can be added on a ContextualEgoNetwork to listen to structural changes. Modeled callbacks are triggered by the respective components. Call ContextualEgoNetwork.addListener(ContextualEgoNetworkListener) to add a listener to a network. Callbacks are not polymorphised to improve understanding when implementing new listeners.
    Be careful not to keep references to removed nodes and contexts as these could potentially cause memory leaks (optimally, refrain from keeping any references to such objects, but otherwise use the respective onRemove callbacks). Listeners are not saved alongside the network and must be added upon load, i.e. immediately after calling ContextualEgoNetwork.createOrLoad(String, String, Object)
    Author:
    Emmanouil Krasanakis (maniospas@hotmail.com)

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void init​(ContextualEgoNetwork contextualEgoNetwork)
      Called when the listener is added to a contextual ego network.
      default void onAddNode​(Context context, Node node)
      Called when a node is added to a context (after the node is added).
      default void onCreateContext​(Context context)
      Called when a new context is created by the ContextualEgoNetwork.getOrCreateContext(Object) method (after the created context is added to the network).
      default void onCreateEdge​(Edge edge)
      Called when an edge is created in a context using the Context.addEdge(Node, Node) method (after the edge is created).
      default void onCreateInteraction​(Interaction interaction)
      Called when an interaction is created (after it has been added to an edge).
      default void onCreateNode​(Node node)
      Called when a new node is created by the ContextualEgoNetwork.getOrCreateNode(String, Object) method (after the created node is added to the network).

      Called when the Context.save() method of a context is called (after the save has completed).

    • Method Detail

      • init

        default void init​(ContextualEgoNetwork contextualEgoNetwork)
        Called when the listener is added to a contextual ego network. Checks for ensuring that the listener is assigned to only one network (if needed) must be implemented on the respective listener. However, it is not mandatory to keep the network the listener is being added to, as this can be retrieved from the CrossModuleComponent.getContextualEgoNetwork() method of nodes, contexts and edges.
        Parameters:
        contextualEgoNetwork - The contextual ego network the listener has been added to.

      • onCreateNode

        default void onCreateNode​(Node node)
        Called when a new node is created by the ContextualEgoNetwork.getOrCreateNode(String, Object) method (after the created node is added to the network).
        Parameters:
        node - The created node.

      • onRemoveNode

        default void onRemoveNode​(Node node)
        Called when a node is removed from the contextual ego network by the ContextualEgoNetwork.removeNodeIfExists(String) method. Contrary to creation callbacks, this is called before the node is removed from the network. This callback is different than onRemoveNode(Context, Node), although the latter will necessarily have been called before reaching this one, as nodes removed from the network are also removed from all contexts first.
        Parameters:
        node - The removed node.

      • onCreateContext

        default void onCreateContext​(Context context)
        Called when a new context is created by the ContextualEgoNetwork.getOrCreateContext(Object) method (after the created context is added to the network).
        Parameters:
        context - The created context.

      • onLoadContext

        default void onLoadContext​(Context context)
        Called when the Context.load() method of a context is called. Note that this method is often called by other methods of the Context class to retrieve the context's data if they have been removed from the memory through Context.cleanup(). The callback is called after all context data are retrieved to memory.
        Parameters:
        context - The loaded context.

      • onSaveContext

        default void onSaveContext​(Context context)
        Called when the Context.save() method of a context is called (after the save has completed). This method is also implicitly called by ContextualEgoNetwork.save() and Context.cleanup() and hence a callback will also be triggered at those times.
        Parameters:
        context - The saved context.

      • onRemoveContext

        default void onRemoveContext​(Context context)
        Called when a context is removed from the contextual ego network by the ContextualEgoNetwork.removeContext(Context) method. Contrary to creation callbacks, this is called before the context is removed from the network.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to be removed.

      • onAddNode

        default void onAddNode​(Context context,
                       Node node)
        Called when a node is added to a context (after the node is added).
        Parameters:
        context - The context.
        node - The node added to the context.

      • onRemoveNode

        default void onRemoveNode​(Context context,
                          Node node)
        Called when a node is removed from a context using the Context.removeNode(Node). That method is also called by the Context.removeNodeIfExists(Node) and ContextualEgoNetwork.removeNodeIfExists(String) methods, so this callback occurs on those operations too. Contrary to creation callbacks, this is called before the node is removed from the context. If the node has edges, onRemoveEdge(Edge) callbacks of those edges will follow.
        Parameters:
        context - The context.
        node - The node just removed from the context.

      • onCreateEdge

        default void onCreateEdge​(Edge edge)
        Called when an edge is created in a context using the Context.addEdge(Node, Node) method (after the edge is created). That method is also called by the Context.getOrAddEdge(Node, Node) method. Note that the context can be retrieved from the edge using the Edge.getContext() method.
        Parameters:
        edge - The created edge.

      • onRemoveEdge

        default void onRemoveEdge​(Edge edge)
        Called when an is removed from a context using the Context.removeEdge(Node, Node) method. That method is also called by the Context.removeNodeIfExists(Node) and Context.removeNode(Node). Contrary to creation callbacks, this is called before the edge is removed from the context.
        Parameters:
        edge - The edge to be removed.

      • onCreateInteraction

        default void onCreateInteraction​(Interaction interaction)
        Called when an interaction is created (after it has been added to an edge). To retrieve the interaction's edge use the Interaction.getEdge() method.
        Parameters:
        interaction - The created interaction.
